description: After an apple pie recipe with a twist? Give these blackberry jam and apple pie bites a try and enjoy flashbacks to eating these treats as a kid.
name: Apple Pie Bites Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 385 g can Woolworths apple slices pie fruit

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, to make the icing, place icing sugar and vanilla in a bowl. Gradually stir in 2 tbs water to make a thin icing. Spoon icing over tarts and scatter over sprinkles. Stand for 20 minutes or until set. Serve.

Meanwhile, to make the icing, place icing sugar and vanilla in a bowl. Gradually stir in 2 tbs water to make a thin icing. Spoon icing over tarts and scatter over sprinkles. Stand for 20 minutes or until set. Serve.
